full_summary:
### [ACAN - State-of-the-Art Deep Learning for Canada-Wide Mineral Prospectivity Mapping]
#### [PAC - Apprentissage Profond de Pointe Appliqué à La Cartographie de La Prospectivité Minérale à L’Echelle Du Canada]

---

### Tender Details

*   **Public Announcement Reference:** WS4567136399-Doc4572311825
*   **Tender Status:** Expired
*   **Publication Date:** May 6, 2024
*   **Closing Date:** May 21, 2024, 14:00 EST

### Tender Description

Natural Resources Canada is conducting research as part of the Critical Mineral Geoscience Data (CMGD) program to support sustainable resource development of critical minerals. The research aims to develop and improve advanced predictive geoscience methodologies to focus exploration efforts and reduce risks. To achieve this, Natural Resources Canada seeks to enhance its ability to accurately predict favorable exploration areas using advanced deep-learning methodologies tailored for the prospectivity mapping of critical minerals at the scale of Canada.

The proposed contract will last for twenty-eight (28) months from the date of contract award and is expected to start on June 14, 2024.

### Procurement Information

*   **Procurement Category:** SRV
*   **Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice
*   **Procurement Method:** Advance contract award notice
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contracting Entity Information

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **End User Entities Information:** Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
*   **End User Entities Address:** 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E4, Canada

### Contact Information

*   **Contact Person:** Melissa Hall (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Contact Email:** [melissa.hall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melissa.hall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

---
